attributes.action: Only have Voluntry Donors as Freedom of Choice must Prevail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Freedom of Choice on the Person to make a Statement that when they die their body parts are/aren't used for Transplant must prevail as Ones choice. Some People may not want their body parts used again as their are too many greedy humans on Earth and humans need to share it with the environment. The Oil burning greedy humans should not have transplants as we need to reduce the amount of fuel burning and other waste.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
